title: Support per-notebook execution environments with artifact storage
description: notebooks/EXECUTION_PLAN.md contains information about the environments for notebook executions. Notebooks are stored in another repo and they are copied over under /notebooks. We need to define local to each notebook environments supported by Makefile and Dockerfiles that will allow each notebook to run and create artifacts eg images and videos stored in its own folder eg /output/images /output/videos /output/audio /output/text
